/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with a variety of buildings, their architecture hinting at the rich history of the city. Cars and buses traverse the road, adding a dynamic element to the scene. Trees and streetlights punctuate the landscape, providing a sense of order amidst the urban hustle and bustle. The sky above is hazy, casting a soft light over the scene.
